imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Update to a TikTok-like dark/neon hero cover with high contrast and modern abstract accents (hero-cover.dim_1600x600.png > hero-cover-tiktok.dim_1600x600.png)
- Update to a TikTok-like dark/neon logo mark (logo.dim_512x512.png > logo-tiktok.dim_512x512.png)
- Update to a TikTok-like neon trophy icon on transparent background (trophy-icon-transparent.dim_200x200.png > trophy-icon-neon.dim_200x200.png)
- Update to a TikTok-like neon face verification icon on transparent background (face-verify-icon.dim_150x150.png > face-verify-icon-neon.dim_150x150.png)
- Update to a TikTok-like neon verification badge on transparent background (verification-badge.dim_100x100.png > verification-badge-neon.dim_100x100.png)
- Update to a TikTok-like dark/neon celebration background with confetti/glow accents (celebration-bg.dim_1200x800.png > celebration-bg-tiktok.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Restyle the app with a TikTok-like visual theme and format while keeping the existing winner verification flow unchanged (lookup → activation → eligibility → identity upload → receipt → completion). The new look should be predominantly dark, high-contrast, and modern, with neon accent highlights (e.g., cyan and hot pink), bold display typography, and a mobile-first layout aesthetic reminiscent of TikTok UI patterns (clean dark surfaces, punchy accent CTAs, subtle glow accents, tight spacing, rounded UI).

Update the app shell (Header/Footer) and page layout to better match a TikTok-like format: use a darker header/footer treatment, tighten vertical spacing, and apply subtle neon accent cues (e.g., active icon/color highlights, thin accent dividers, or soft glow shadows) while preserving existing text content and links.
Update existing generated brand images to visually match the TikTok-like dark/neon theme and update the UI to reference the updated assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the app UI to match a TikTok-like theme/format/style.
